attributes.action: Stop moy park changing the shifts and call for a strike with all the changes
attributes.additional_details: Moy park Ballymena. We need a union to call a strike they strike with other company's but with moy park they let them do what they want and can't stop them. People losing jobs they done for years and nothing being done to stop them and forcing us onto new shirts that we don't want to do but have no say if union says ok to them. We need our voice heard and need action
attributes.background: Forcing workers and mangers out of a job and made people reapply for there jobs and gave to other people. Also forcing us for work more days or we loss our job
